content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of the conversation was the rental price for an apartment in Magdeburg.
name: Max Müller

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: Why did you not agree on a final price?
name: Evaluator

content: Because the potential tenant (Max Müller) was not willing to meet the landlord's (Peter Schmidt) asking price of 925 Euros per month, and the landlord was not willing to lower the price to the tenant's budget of 850 Euros per month.
name: Max Müller

content: If you did not agree on a final price, what was the next step in the negotiation process?
name: Evaluator

content: The next step in the negotiation process would have been to either continue discussing potential compromises or to terminate the negotiation. Since the conversation ended with an impasse, there was no further negotiation.
name: Max Müller
